https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iAcPYIsYwFqAyY7KctWkkdkJGhI.jpg A peaceful alien planet faces annihilation, as the homeless remainder of the human race sets its eyes on Terra. Mala, a rebellious Terrian teenager, will do everything she can to stop it. Battle for Terra
